name: Forma Robotics
description: Forma Robotics is building the world’s first decentralized Robotics-as-a-Service (RaaS) network — powered by a fully modular, open-source robotic arm that anyone can build, deploy, and monetize. By combining robotics, crypto-native payments, and distributed compute, we enable individuals and companies to operate robots remotely and earn revenue from real-world automation tasks. Forma aims to make robotics accessible, permissionless, and owned by the community.
